description: Technical mountaineering boot with a crampon insert on the back: The Kento Pro High GTX® Men combines a sole design developed by Mammut and Vibram for outstanding grip and minimum weight with high-quality Mastrotto split leather for "made in Italy" sustainability. Waterproof and breathable thanks to a Gore-Tex membrane. Motion Control for better protection from twisted ankles with a special high heel cap. Memo foam provides excellent comfort in the shoe. Kento Pro - the pro among mountaineering boots.
name: Mammut Kento Pro High GTX - Mens

specs.value: Blend of supple inner and tough outer materials for enhanced comfort and good adaptability.
Individual 2-zone lacing. Can be adjusted to person and situation
Reinforced, flexible inside prevents you from twisting your ankle while maintaining full freedom of movement
